about_the_game:
Explore the Wunderling soundtrack at your own pace!

Follow the trail of our lovable lemon-like protagonist while humming along to the various beats, themes, and emotions provided by dexterous artist Ratvader.


All music written, performed, recorded, mixed, and produced by

Oscar Sidoff Ratvader Rydelius

Musicians

Hot Choo-Choo
Bass - Christopher Ek

Popsicle Trip
Gitarr - Calle von Schoenberg

Caravan Shake
Alto Saxophone - Johannes Bergil

Castle Pomp
Saxophone - Evelina Enestig
Trumpet - Robin Backgård

Junkyard Cycle
Contrabass - Johan Bengtsson
Drums - William Soovik

Snoozy Calypso
Additional Piano - Joel Bille

Turnip the Heat
Drums - William Soovik

All Music Mastering by

Anders Lagerfors in Nacksving Studio 1

Special Thanks

Pelle Cahndlerby, Olof Karlsson, Anders Lagerfors, and Joel Bille

name: Wunderling - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
